build: npm install && npm run build && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:all
sequelize: npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate:undo:all && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:migrate && npm run sequelize --prefix backend db:seed:all
